metadata.title: CVE-2021-21224 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Type confusion in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 90.0.4430.85 allowed aremote attacker to execute arbitrary code inside a sandbox via a craftedHTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
